                                    throws java.text.ParseException
        Returns any time in local time

        sDate - departure date or arrival date in "yyyy MMM dd HH:mm z" format

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Determine if object instance has valid attribute data Verifies the name is not null and not an empty string. Verifies code is 3 characters in length. Verifies latitude is between +90.0 north pole and -90.0 south pole. Verifies longitude is between +180.0 east prime meridian and -180.0 west prime meridian.
        Returns:
        true if object passes above validation checks
